column4: is there a standard directory to keep SVN lib sources on my PC or should i keep them in home folder ?
I just stashed mine in folder in /home/me
k, just thought there is some standard directory, *nix is full of this standards as I understand it and i'm pretty new to it :)
yeah, when your compiling, you'll be working out of the folder you put the source in so its never been a problem for me
